columns.name: Debit
columns.description: Debit amount (outgoing). Empty for credit transactions.

columns.name: Credit
columns.description: Credit amount (incoming). Empty for debit transactions.

columns.name: Balance
columns.description: Account balance after transaction (may be empty for some rows)

notes: Debit and Credit are mutually exclusive - one will be empty
Balance may be empty for some transactions
Details field contains transaction description/merchant name
Simpler format than AIB - only 5 columns
